comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Georgi Stoyanov Todorov (Bulgarian: Георги Тодоров) (born on 10 August 1858 in Bolgrad (contemporary Ukraine); died on 16 November 1934 in Sofia) was a Bulgarian General who fought in the Russo-Turkish War (1877–1878), Serbo-Bulgarian War (1885), Balkan Wars (1912–1913) and First World War (1914–1918)." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Georgi_Todorov_%28general%29

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Some additional or different information and photos on his Bulgarian Wikipedia page: bg.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%93%D0%B5%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B3%D0%B...

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: B-59 and artolog: Thank you for providing more information on Todorov. We will adjust the record accordingly.
